sections.features: LAER is the first of its kind. A bluetooth enabled laptop sleeve that can charge all of your devices simultaneously wherever you are.

LAER.text: LAER was created to simplify your life. It's an app controlled charging solution that replaces all chargers, adapters and portable batteries with one compact device made for travel and working on the go, specifically designed for luggage and bags. LAER is the only charging solution with a fully customisable output to safely power any device. Charge your laptop, smartphone and tablet simultaneously wherever you are.

ARROE App.text: Our app is able to customise the voltage and current output of our battery to match the device it is charging which is done from our mobile app. All other power banks output set voltages (i.e. 12/15/19v) which do not match the voltage inputs on most laptops which means charging your laptop/surface device at these set voltages you are damaging the battery! Ours is the first portable battery that can safely charge any laptop.

The Battery Cartridge.text: The cartridge system we designed for the battery allows you to easily switch between lower and higher capacity batteries thereby choosing the amount of power and weight you carry with you that day.

The Sleeve.text: We designed a closure system that allows you to keep LAER as compact as possible when not in use. Our two magnet system switches between charging and resting modes seamlessly providing extra room for the laptop connectors when needed. Our magnetic closure system also allows you quick, easy access to your laptop whenever you need it.

Connectors.text: With our custom laptop connectors you can charge devices from all major brands including Apple, Surface, Sony, Toshiba, Dell, HP, Asus, Acer, Samsung, Lenovo

The Charger.text: LAER comes with a 60w output USB-C Power Delivery charger with swappable wall plugs for all countries (type A, C, G, I) and supporting 2m USB-C cable

About us.text: Based in London, ARROE was founded in 2016 by Eoin Cooney and Romain Pascal who previously worked together on the smart luggage brand SLAINT. After successfully bringing multiple products to market they realised that the technology required to make the perfect product didn't exist yet. So they decided to make their own and ARROE was born to develop technology that allows people to harness and store energy on an individual level to charge personal devices, wearables and smart clothing.

Our Aim.text: Increased mobility, enabled by technology, is the future. All technology needs connectivity and power to work. Connectivity is constantly improving, but how are we going to power the technology of tomorrow? We are developing technology that allows people to harness and store energy on an individual level to charge personal devices, wearables and smart clothing.

Free yourself from the wall socket™.text: Work from anywhere and leave the socket hunting behind.

Interchangeable battery cartridge system.text: Bring as much power and as many cartridges with you as you need. Airlines only allow you to fly with a power bank under 100Wh but with our battery cartridge system you can fly with as much power as you like! Choose between either 20,000mAh or 10,000mAh cartridges.

Arrive in style.text: Specifically designed for luggage and approved for airline carry-on, LAER fits neatly into most backpacks allowing you to charge your devices wherever you are.

Libérez vous de la prise murale.text: Travailler en toute liberté et oubliez la chasse aux prises.

Système de cartouches interchangeables.text: Embarquez avec autant d'énergie que nécessaire avec plusieurs cartouches. Les régulations des compagnies aériennes limitent les batteries à 100Wh mais grâce à notre système de cartouches interchangeables vous pouvez voyager avec autant de cartouches que vous le souhaitez. Choisissez vos cartouches de 20 000mAh ou 10 000mAh.

Voyagez avec élégance.text: Concu specifiquement pour les bagages et approuvé pour les sacs et valises cabine, LAER se glisse facilement dans un sac à dos pour recharger vos appareils où que vous soyez.

Mach dich Frei von der Steckdose™.text: Arbeite von überall aus und lass die Steckdosensuche hinter dir.

Austauschbares Batteriekartensystem.text: Nimm so viel Strom und Batteriekarten mit wie du brauchst. Fluglinien erlauben es dir lediglich Power Banks mit unter 100Wh mitzunehmen, aber mit unserem Batteriekartensystem kannst du mit so viel Strom wie du willst fliegen! Wähle zwischen 20,000mAh oder 10,000mAh Batteriekarten.

Mit Stil ankommen.text: Speziell designed für Gepäck und zulässig im Flugzeug Handgepäck passt LAER geschickt in fast alle Rucksäcke, sodass du deine Geräte immer und überall unterwegs laden kannst.

..text: Streamline your charging and lighten your load. LAER replaces all your other chargers, adaptors and power banks.

...text: Most compact 60W USB-C PD 3.0 charger on the market. Includes USB-C PD 3.0 2m charging cable.

....text: Streamlined international travel adapters (US adapter built into charger)

.....text: Laptop connectors for all major makes and models of laptop and a 2m extender cable for when you want to charge your laptop while working.

..text: Simplifiez vos recharges et alléger vos bagages. LAER remplace tous vos chargeurs, adaptateurs, et batteries portables.

...text: Le chargeur 60W USB-C PD 3.0 le plus compact du marché. Inclus un cable de charge USB-C PD 3.0 de 2 mètres

....text: Adaptateurs de voyages internationaux compacts et simplifiés (prise US intégrée au chargeur)

.....text: Connectique pour toutes les marques leader d’ordinateurs portables. Câble d’extension de 2 mètres pour charger votre ordinateur en travaillant.

..text: Optimiere das Aufladen und erleichtere deine Traglast. LAER ersetzt alle anderen Ladegeräte, Adapter und Power Banks.

...text: Das kompakteste 60W USB-C PD 3.0 Ladegerät auf dem Markt. Beinhaltet USB-C PD 3.0 2m Ladekabel.

....text: Optimierte internationale Reiseadapter (US Adapter in Ladegerät eingebaut)

.....text: Laptop-Adapter für die meisten Laptop Modelle und ein 2m Verlängerungskabel zum Aufladen deines Laptops während des Arbeitens.

sections.support: We’d like to find out more about your device so you can get the product that fits best

text: Charge on the go with our proprietary closure system
Charge your laptop (PC or MAC)
Charge your phone in minutes with Quick Charge
Charge your phone and wearables wirelessly or via USB/USB-C
Charge your MagSafe Macbook with our proprietary connectors
Easily switch battery capacities to suit your day using our proprietary cartridge system
Easily switch between wireless and magnetic cabled charging with our proprietary iPhone case
Charge anywhere in the world, adapters for all countries
Manage functionality and battery levels using our app
Track your LAER sleeve from your phone with TrackR
W: 285mm - L: 200mm - H: 13mm
Contains Battery Cells, 2x 3.7v 5,000mAh cells in series
Weight 336g
Contains Battery Cells 2x 3.7v 10,000mAh cells in series
Weight 494g
1x DC output (supporting 12-20V output 60w max)
2x USB-C Power Delivery in/out ports (supporting 5,9,12,15, 20V output 60w max)
1x USB-A QC 3.0 output (5-20v 18W max)
1x Qi Wireless 3.0 charging port (5V, 1A, 5W max)
Bluetooth 5.0
